BibleDatabase::VerseTreeItem

BibleDatabase::VerseTreeItem Class Reference

This class is used to represent a verse and its relationship to other verses in a Translation object that allow it to be displayed in a tree view. More...

#include <VerseTreeItem.h>

Detailed Description

This class is used to represent a verse and its relationship to other verses in a Translation object that allow it to be displayed in a tree view.
